serviceprofile.title: Proposed FMN Spiral 4 Ground-to-Air Situational Awareness Serviceprofile

description.para: The Ground-to-Air Situational (G2A) Awareness Profile provides standards and guidance to support the exchange of Friendly Force Tracking information within a coalition network or a federation of networks over Link 16.

guide.para: Messages exchanged according to the exchange mechanisms described in ADatP-37(A) shall comply with the J-series message schema defined STANAG 5516, Tactical Data Exchange â€“ Link 16 and STANAG 5518, Interoperability Standard for Joint Range Extension Application Protocol (JREAP)
